mapper.sql: id, master_id, real_file_name, file_name, file_type, file_size, save_address, uri, uploaded
mapper.insert:
insert into moneyfeed.cs_attachments (id, master_id, real_file_name, file_name, file_type, file_size, save_address, uri, uploaded ) values
(#{model.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{model.masterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{model.realFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{model.saveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.uploaded,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
